My first multiplayer game-
Made under 3days, may contain bugs for now.  Please leave a comment if you find any.  Downloads for executables (extract zip for your OS) are provided but couldn't export the game to HTML (because the protocol I used can't be used to send packets through browser, so for now only executables)

Othello-
It's a board-game, with a 64 block-board and 64 double sided coins(tokens). One side belong to color of one player and other belongs to second player. Each player has to put coins (facing up on their side) next to any coin on board (facing up to opponent's side) such that an array of opponent's coins are captured between two of your coins. The captured coins are then flipped. If no such move exists then pass the turn to other player, but if it exists then chance can't be passed.
When board is filled or both players are out of legal moves, then the player having most coins facing up on his/her side wins.
